title: Does the proposed (?) contract between R3 & NH County allow R3 to import garbage from outside the county?  In other places landfills have been sold to private contractors only to find that the contractor hauls in waste from out of the area or even out of state to make money.  Having a site with potential river access makes garbage barges from New York seem possible.  Will this be allowed?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7864
